product.name: Chicology Cordless Roller Shades Snap-N'-Glide, Light FilteringPerfect for Living Room/Bedroom/Nursery/Office and More.Urban White (Light Filtering), 35"W X 72"H
product.description:
Stay tangle free with our cordless light filtering roller shades! Snap N' Glide operating mechanism ensures that the shade gently rolls up and smoothly glides back down. Modern and sleek design is a great fit for bedrooms, living rooms, home offices, and more.
Tug on the pull cord to lower your shades. Pull down on the shade again to trigger the mechanism and it will automatically glide back up by itself.
Two-way mount allows you to choose the best fit for your windows. Fabric curls into a neat compact roll when fully raised and won't block your view.
High quality light filtering fabric helps protect against harsh glare and UV rays. Blocks intense heat when pulled all the way down.
These shades are an ideal choice for larger windows, offering a clean and polished appearance.
Are these shades machine washable?
No, we only recommend light spot cleaning with a damp cloth. Avoid using any harsh soaps or detergents that may damage the fabric.
Can these be an outside or ceiling mount?
Yes, these can be mounted inside the window frame, outside the window frame, or to the ceiling. The instructions include directions for each mounting style and the included brackets are designed to be used for either.
Is a valance included?
No, they are standard roller shades.
Can people see through these from the outside?
No, this provides privacy.
Can the shade be shortened in length?
It can be used at shorter heights by just pulling down to where it is needed.
We believe window blinds and shades are more than just functional necessities. Every window tells a story, and our products are part of that narrative.
With a focus on affordability, innovation, and ease of installation, we have revolutionized window treatments to suit the modern lifestyle.
Effortlessly make your home a place as chic as you are.

specifications.product_care_instructions: **Do Not wash, use strong detergents, or spot removers. Dry cleaning is not recommended.** ** Do Not use water, strong detergents, or abrasive solutions to clean the blind; can cause damage. ** ** Avoid contact with window cleaning products. ** Use a slightly damp cloth to spot clean and blot gently or a vacuum with an upholstery attachment to clean your Chicology shades when dusty. Be careful not to wrinkle or crush the fabric when cleaning.
